import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from '../../Button'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import * as yup from "yup"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export default function ContactFrom (props) { const [mail, setMail] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }); function handleSubmit(e) { const { name, email, subject, message } = mail let template = { from_name: 'email_76a93b0c10913895ddf5f65f', to_name: 'kriihall@gmail.com', name: name, email: email, subject: subject, message: message, } e.preventDefault() console.log('data', e) emailjs.sendForm( 'gmail', 'hoftun_utvikling_contact', template, 'user_MSNaVHeavXdZJVRpODQpv' ) } return (

Send en Melding

Navn E-Post Emne Melding
) }
